DOC.criteria: Age > = 18 year old cervical cancer histologically proven ( squamous cell carcinoma , adenocarcinoma neuroendocrine cell carcinoma ) Uterovaginal brachytherapy indication : : Stage 1B1 : brachytherapy surgery Stages IB2 IIIB : pelvic radiotherapy ( 45Gy/25 fractions/5 week ) without concomitant chemotherapy Ability provide inform write consent form Patient must affiliate social security system Age < 18 year old History pelvic radiotherapy History pelvic surgery Recent joint prothesis ( < 3 month ) Pregnant woman breastfeed Patients deprive liberty supervision
